pageTitle: ENGLISH EASY IS WITH GRAMMAR FOCUS: VERBO GO
TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {15409=Vejam na tabela abaixo um resumo da estrutura do tempo Presente Contínuo. Utilizamos como exemplo o verbo drink (tomar, beber).}
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {1018193=May I come in ?, 933156=2 – I will be absent…… January., 1019815=May I go to the club?, 1018131=May I go?, 818946=1 - ………lead in heavy. 2-……….James Watt reinvented……….steam engine in 1760. 3- …………gold and……….silver are scaree., 754017=►Para se formar o passado simples dos verbos regulares acrescenta-se - d / -ed ao verbo. Ex.: Love - loved change - changed talk - talked play - played, 918506=3 – We haven’t studied French since February., 752619=3 – I ___________ (enter) this group in January., 923379=►Personas neste exemplo não se esqueçam de que Who (é para pessoas) that (é para coisas) e quando for testes (prova) de conhecimento gramatical (Grammar Focus) não use that para ambos .}
textBeforeTable: PERSONAL PRONOUNS LESSON ONE When I need you
textAfterTable: 1 – Apes are very intelligent animals. 2 – The teacher is doing her work in the teachers’ room. 3 - What’s the problem with the girls? ADVANCED Transform the sentences. Example: She is making a cake for Dad(him). See more in table She is making him a cake.
